about_the_game:
Flow Parkour is a 3D platformer made with the game engine Unity. Early versions of the game caught my friends attention so I took it seriously and decided to publish it. It has an art style that revolves around the infamous cube and a difficulty that will have you smashing your keyboard in 30 minutes.



Flow Parkour comes in two game modes, the normal version and the endless version. The normal version, which has around 30 levels on release, is the original game mode. Your target is to make it to the finish of the obstacle course as quick as possible without dying. (getting hit by a turret, falling in a trap...) In most levels you have access to your weapons, sometimes you only have one of the weapons. It depends on the level. Each level has its own difficulty with a given target. Endless is a game mode with a score, you need to rank up the highest score possible while lasting as long as possible with no weapons but a grappler. You need to cross a large map just to collect around a 100 points without dying every time...



Flow parkour has 5 difficulties :

  • Easy - A short or simple level
  • Moderate - A short level that has little to no obstacles (such as turrets)
  • Difficult - A longer level that has a bit more obstacles
  • Very difficult - A level with a very hefty amount of buffed turrets or any other obstacles
  • Extreme - A very long and complex level with buffed turrets with a ridiculous amount of obstacles that makes it nearly impossible to finish

So what are you waiting for ? Download Flow Parkour today on steam !

highlighted.name: Everything must come to an end...

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Processor: Core i7 8th generation
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are the bare minimum requirements to play the game if the graphics are on the lowest settings
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M1 chip
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 chip
  • Additional Notes: These requirements shall give you a smoother in-game experience

name: Flow Parkour

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5 8th generation
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia geforce mx130
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Running the game on low quality graphics at 1080p should give you more than 60 fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel core i5 11th generation
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia geforce GTX 1060 3/6 GB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Running the game on high quality graphics at 1080p should give you more than 60 fps

short_description: A simple yet fun platformer game made with the game engine unity.
